about_the_game:
Waste Walkers

Supply Lines Expansion DLC:

The Supply Lines Expansion for Waste Walkers offers a new repeatable side activity of collecting and delivering gasoline, 4 new skins, and more importantly an all new shop offering new equipment and weapons along with a steady supply of ammunition to give your trek through the wastes some extra kick!

  • New Repeatable Activity - Gasoline Delivery - Keep your supply lines going by bringing gasoline to the supplier for extra money and experience!
  • New Supply Shop - Located at Safe Hold Colony - A convenient shop with all the new equipment in this pack and also all ammunition types available permanently!
  • New Runner's Wardrobe added to your stash with the 4 skins listed below!
  • 1x Supply Runner Skin (M)
  • 1x Caravan Guard Skin (M)
  • 1x Peace Keeper Skin (F)
  • 1x Waster Skin (F)
  • New Wakizashi Weapon - The smaller brother of the mighty katana.
  • New Combat Shotgun Weapon - Because a pump shotgun just isn't enough.
  • New DMR Weapon - Designated Marksman Rifle, great for taking down heavier enemies!
  • New Fire Poker Weapon - Poke a fire, a mutant, or whatever you like!
  • New Screw Driver Weapon - Fix all your problems!
  • New Hand Cannon Weapon - A heavy pistol that can deliver a heck of a punch!
  • New Frying Pan Weapon - Cook up some pain!
  • New Plate Carrier Armor - For when you want everything dead except yourself.
  • New "Go" Kit Item - Ready for when you're on the go, this kit will really help out by lowering radiation, providing food, water, a bit of healing, and cure bleeding and disease!
  • New Smelling Salts Item - Useful for keeping your team going despite overwhelming odds, these cheap but effective smelling salts are a new alternative for the rare defibrillator.
  • New Wasteland Crop Food Item - Cheap but abundant, these crops have been grown across the radioactive wasteland!
  • 15 Tabs (Money) Added to your stash as a thank you for your support!

PLEASE NOTE: IN ORDER TO ACTIVATE THIS PACK, YOU MUST ACCESS YOUR PERSONAL STASH INSIDE YOUR HOME. YOU ARE NOT REQUIRED TO START A NEW GAME - YOU CAN ACTIVATE THIS AT ANYTIME!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
